TITLE: Chalk Talk
DEF: An impromptu presentation, unscripted and without using aids
TASK: The Chalk Talk pattern bolsters informal, interactive presentations by leveraging the speaker's aptitude to illustrate concepts on a chalkboard or whiteboard. This spontaneous and dynamic form of teaching often spurs insightful discussions and fosters a profound understanding of the topic at hand. To utilize this pattern effectively, aspects such as the clarity of illustrations, appropriate pacing of the talk, and the active involvement of the audience should be prioritized.
